mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tbl ( pro_num, cate_prt_code, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_new, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_uploadpath, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy ) VALUES ( seq_product_num.nextval, #{cate_prt_code}, #{cate_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_discount}, #{pro_new}, #{pro_publisher}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_uploadpath}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_amount}, #{pro_buy} )
mapper.select: SELECT cate_code, cate_prt_code, cate_name FROM category_tbl WHERE cate_prt_code IS NULL
SELECT cate_code, cate_prt_code, cate_name FROM category_tbl WHERE cate_prt_code = #{cate_code}

SELECT pro_num, cate_prt_code, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_new, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_img, pro_uploadpath, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate
FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(product_tbl pk_product_tbl) */ rownum rn, pro_num, cate_prt_code, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_new, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_uploadpath, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate FROM product_tbl WHERE
rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) )
WHERE rn > ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} )

SELECT count(*) FROM product_tbl WHERE
pro_num > 0

SELECT pro_num, cate_prt_code, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_new, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_uploadpath, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate FROM product_tbl WHERE pro_num = #{pro_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_tbl SET cate_prt_code = #{cate_prt_code}, cate_code = #{cate_code}, pro_name = #{pro_name}, pro_price = #{pro_price}, pro_new = #{pro_new}, pro_discount = #{pro_discount}, pro_publisher = #{pro_publisher}, pro_content = #{pro_content}, pro_uploadpath = #{pro_uploadpath}, pro_img = #{pro_img}, pro_amount = #{pro_amount}, pro_buy = #{pro_buy}, pro_updatedate = sysdate WHERE pro_num = #{pro_num}
